meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Turkey.
meanings.sent1: In Turkey, you can buy many things with just a few liras.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for liras at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The piggy bank was so full of liras that it almost burst!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a handful of shiny liras, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The sound of clinking liras in his pocket was music to his ears.

meanings.definition: Plural form of lira, the basic monetary unit of Turkey.
meanings.sent1: She counted the liras in her wallet and realized she had enough to buy a gift.
meanings.sent2: The street market was bustling with vendors accepting liras for their goods.
meanings.sent3: The children played with toy liras, pretending to go shopping in their make-believe store.
meanings.sent4: The liras in the charity box symbolized the community's generosity.
meanings.sent5: The colorful liras sparkled under the sunlight, catching everyone's attention.
